# 58. RabbitMQ upgrade to 3.10.7 version

**Date:** 2022-10-30

**Optional per env:** _only required on some environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
This change upgrade RabbitMQ 3.10.7 version. 
The current installed RabbitMQ version 3.8.5 is already End of Life. 
So, we strongly recommend applying this change. 

## Details
As part of our ongoing effort to keep CommCare HQ up to date with the latest tools and 
libraries we have updated RabbitMQ to 3.10.7 version. 

## Steps to update
1. For users running RabbitMQ on Linux machines:
   instructions: [RabbitMQ_upgrade](https://commcare-cloud.readthedocs.io/en/latest/services/rabbitmq/upgrade.html?highlight=rabbitmq)
